lore: Karandras is a master of stealth and patience, striking in a blur of emerald armour. He assails his enemies with a white-hot burst from the mandiblaster Scorpion’s Bite before ripping them to shreds with his diamond-tipped chainblade Isirmathil, or crushing them in the grip of Arhra’s Bane – his bespoke Scorpion’s claw.

otherAbilities.Shadow Hunter:: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .
otherAbilities.Sustained Assault:: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if it made a Charge move this turn, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 4+ scores a Critical Hit .
